name: City Crow Hunting: Forest Bird Sniper Shooting Game Free
name_original: City Crow Hunting: Forest Bird Sniper Shooting Game Free
description:
*** Fun and challenging game that requires skills and patience in which you will have to take aim and shoot with absolute accuracy to hunt down the birds ***

Hunting is passion which belongs to royal peoples. Let's go for crow hunting in city. If ever there was a terrorist in the bird world it has got to be a crow. He is not a dirty bird like a buzzard. Nor is he the sleek speed demon like a morning dove on a windy day. He may be one of the smartest and wary of all birds and so being becomes its greatest criminal mind. City crow hunting delivers you most addiction of real bird hunting. There are number of crows flying here and there in the city and making lives of the people difficult. Your task is to kill the birds in fewer bullets and in a specified time shown on screen. You are equipped with Sniper gun and, you have to survive with your accurate firing tactics. To get more unlock levels you have to hunt more birds within shortest time. And, to hunt more birds you need best and accurate firing skills, focus on the object, make a quick and sharp decision in this action game. You need best sniper shooting skills in the city.

How to Play:
- Tap the fire button on the screen to shoot
- Use the zoom button for a better close view
- keep an eye on timer
